comment: She sucks at explaining things 0/10. She gives a quiz every day, 5 lowest are dropped, but she doesnt let you make up quizzes if you miss a day. Honestly shes pretty patronizing in the way she explains things too. I wouldn't take her ever again, she really made me hate math more than i already do. Dont take her class.
Loved this teacher. Great at explaining calculus, there is a quiz at the beginning of each class but if you pay attention you will do fine.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: I took this class online during the pandemic so she had online lectures which were very helpful but they were short, she did give lots of help when we went in person! She would go over any example with you and explains the material well! The IS Sessions were what got me through this class though!! GO TO THE IS STUDY SESSIONS.

Quiz every class day but only 1-3 questions over what you just learned. Make sure to go to the free SI sessions (it is a student who has taken the class before). 4 Tests. I would have made an A if I went to the SI sessions for the 1st test.
rating_tags: Lots of homework

comment: It turned out to be a rotational hybrid due to COVID, but it was basically all online because nobody ever went to class. Not a bad professor at all, super-nice, and responsive, but she posted videos weekly and then 2 quizzes weekly. I have to give major credit to my SI for passing. That was definitely the most useful tool of this course is SI.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Like many I struggle in math but had to take calculus. She explains concepts very clearly and relates them to real world things so it's easy to understand. My only complaint is she can come off as rude. There are quizzes every class, but that just forces me to actually study which I appreciate. You won't use the textbook! Just attend class.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Amazing professor. No homework which more than makes up for the daily quizzes. Lowest 5 quizzes are dropped. She will let you exempt the final if you have a good grade and the final can replace your lowest test grade. I found her to be humorous and great at teaching. If you plan on showing up every day then take her. Also GO TO THE SI SESSIONS
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: TAKE HER! She makes the material so much easier to understand. She is clear about your grade in the class. DON'T BUY TEXTBOOK!! You will not use it. Short quiz each class about last class material. Helps your grade. You can opt out of the final if your average is an A after the 3 tests. Note cards for test 2&3, full paper cheat sheet for final.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: Worthy is great. She has another job so it is more difficult to access her outside of class. However, we did have an SI so it was no big deal. She fully explains everything as simply as possible and she gives plenty of examples.

I LOVED Professor Worthy. If you are the kind of person who always goes to class then she is for you. Mini quizzes each class period and a midterm. You can exempt the final if your overall grade is an A. She drops the lowest 5 quiz grades and allows note cards on the midterm and final. She really wants everyone to do well and go to your SI!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: They're quizzes every class over the material from the previous class, she drops the lowest 5. Three tests and a final which you can exempt. If you miss a test she will NOT let you make it up and will replace your lowest test grade with the final. You get a note card cheat sheet on the 2nd & 3rd test and a full sheet on the final. Go to SI it helps
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things--Tough grader

comment: This professor is a very solid choice for MATH1160. There are daily quizzes and 3 tests. Average an A overall and you are exempt from the final. 5 quizzes are dropped. If you do happen to miss a test, the final will replace it. So don't miss test days. The textbook isn't necessary but can help to have more practice. USE YOUR SI, IF YOU HAVE ONE.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: This class was honestly great! However, if you're someone who just shows up to class and doesn't study you won't do well. You have a quiz over the previous days material every day, but they aren't hard if you study and if you have an SI you should definitely go. I wouldn't have been able to exempt my exam unless I went to my SI sessions.
rating_tags: Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: Ms. Worthy was great. Material is presented clearly. In general one concept is covered at the beginning of each class and then you go over examples. Next class is a quiz over the previous class. Gives practice tests/study guide and gives a note card to use on test 2 and 3. Would take again.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: She is a cold and easily annoyed person as well as very condescending when asked questions about the material. Very harsh grader, will take away points on the questions even if you get the right answer, but do not label specifically as she expects. Impossible to reach outside of class, she does not respond to emails.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY

comment: Mrs. Worthy was a great professor. I went to every class and attended most SI sessions and ended up with a B, almost an A. Homework is non-mandatory but there if you want it. I personally did not do any. I highly recommend going to the SI sessions. A quiz every class based on the previous classes lecture. 5 lowest quizes dropped at the end.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Great teacher!! Quiz every class so its very important not to skip. The test reviews are exactly like the test. Easy A if you do and understand the text review. If you have an A before the final, you dont have to take the final. Overall, solid choice. Take her!!!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: definitely one of my favorite professors!!! quiz every day so don't skip class. drops 5 lowest quiz grades. 3 tests & a final. if you have an A before the final you don't have to take it. review packets are JUST LIKE THE TEST. easy A if you do the review packets and go to the si sessions!

Quiz every class, 3 tests, and a final. Go to SI sessions! She drops the 5 lowest quizzes if you miss less than 5 classes. Test reviews are exactly like the test. She has an attitude if you ask her a question, but overall she's a good professor.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: Like most math classes, there is usually a quiz on the material covered from the last class every day. Professor Worthy is a great professor, and she knows how to teach business calculus very well. Extra credit opportunities are available on each test. Take her for Math 1160!!!
rating_tags: Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Quizzes every class, but they help prepare you for the exams. Book was useful for extra practice, but not needed. She's a good professor overall. 3 exams and cumulative final. If you get an A on the first 3 exams you don't have to take the final.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: Very high school-like class. Quiz every day on the previous day's material. Never used the textbook, which I felt would have been beneficial. But Prof. Worthy is very smart and dedicated and cares about her students. Not necessarily my favorite style of teaching but she is a good professor all around.
rating_tags: Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Hands down one of the best prof. i've had. Quizzes everyday in class, but she drops 5 and they are just based on the previous class & they aren't that hard. If you go to class, you'll be fine. Don't buy the book unless you need more practice. If you have an A in the class by the final, you don't have to take the final.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Clear grading criteria

comment: This professor has no time for questions or anything outside her lesson. She is overly burdened with her High School job to make additional time. You will take a 1 to 2 question quiz at the very start of EVERY class, so if you miss 1 question you will fail the quiz. The student led SI sessions were the only way I learned anything here. DoNotTake!
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY

comment: Always seemed cold and snapped when asked questions. Certainly picks favorites.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Hands down one of the best professors i've had at KSU. Very caring and is very clear in her lectures. There are short quizzes every day in class but they will help you! Notecard for every test and study guides that look exactly like the test. GO TO CLASS and take notes!! If you have an A in the class after the 3rd test u dont have to take the final
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Clear grading criteria

comment: Daily quizzes. Very manageable, they're based on the previous class and can really help your grade. I got 70 on all my exams so the quizzes pulled me up a whole letter grade. If you have an A then the final is exempt.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Ms. Worthy is amazing! Her teaching style is so clear. You will actually learn, and she truly wants you to succeed. There are quizzes every day, but they are SO helpful. She gives you a review for every test, DO IT (it is the same concept as the actual test). If you can, TAKE HER TAKE HER TAKE HER.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: There are quizzes every day that count as attendance, and the only other grades are the 3 tests and a final. This isn't a class you can afford to skip and learn everything right before the test. That said, if you put in the effort to pay attention during class and go to an SI session or two an A is not hard because she is a great teacher.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--Tests are tough

comment: Great professor. She knows her stuff and explains things in ways that are very easy to understand. Short quizzes every class on material from the previous class. Drops low grades and gives bonus questions. The only semi-downside is she will throw curve balls at you on some of the exams. Highly recommended.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Would take again

comment: Mrs. Worthy is a phenomenal teacher. She has quizzes every class, and gives room for you to fail or miss them. Every test has a review that is very similar. She wants to see you succeed, and is very knowledgable. Great communicator so she will digest the info, and make it understandable. Four exams, if you get first 3 A's, you exempt the final.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: She is a great teacher. At first I was afraid to take this class because I am terrible at math but she goes through problems step by step. The textbook is not mandatory but it's great practice. She'll give you bonus points for coming to class and there are quizzes almost everyday. She has powerpoint notes but she explains everything wonderfully
rating_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: There is a short quiz every class but they are exactly like problems from class and the homework. As long as you show up to class and take notes you'll pass. She has a great personality and makes calculus make a lot more sense. Definitely would recommend.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: Professor Worthy made calculus way more understandable to everyone in the classroom, I failed calc the first time and when I took her I got an A. she does give quizzes every day and her tests she allows you to use note cards and on the final allows you to use a whole sheet of paper.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Great teacher and person. Show up and pay attention and you will do very well. With an A you can omit the final. Quiz EVERY class on previous class material, not hard if you took notes and reviewed for 10 minutes. Mid term and final.
rating_tags: Respected--Caring--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: I have been out of KSU for 5-6 years because I couldn't manage to pass Calculus. I took Professor Worthy and I have managed to get a B in the class. I have been a C student in Math all of my life but worked my butt off and she made all the difference. There are daily quizzes over the previous lecture material make sure do your best. I reccomend her
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: I haven't done any math for the last 5 years, and the formula too passing her tests and class is to, show up at every class, Go to every SI sessions (THANK YOU HANNAH!), find another tutor to help you when Hannah or Ms. Worthy can't. Try to understand the material before you get to the quizzes. Ms. Worthy is a fantastic professor. Thank you
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY

comment: She is a very good teacher. The tests are the same as the reviews, just tougher questions. She moves very fast and gets an attitude when you don't understand something. There is a quiz every class, doing the homework is not mandatory but to pass it is mandatory. Gives 2 extra credit opportunities that saved my grade. Overall good teacher

She is awesome! She knows the material extremely well. Very nice. Quiz before each class but they are not hard. Four tests and the final drops the lowest one. Just go to class, do the quiz, get your attendance, do the review guide, and it is not a bad class at all. I definitely recommend.

I am terrible at math but she really teaches in a way that you ca understand. I haven't done so good on the tests but the quizzes we have every class and attendance grade really boost your grade. Definitely take her!

I'm a returning non-trad student and almost cried when I started the semester bc I had forgotten all the foundations and the material seemed impossible but she is amazing. I went from thinking getting a C would be impossible to getting an A because of her teaching and clarity. Quiz everyday but she tells you what it will be over,  drop 5 lowest.

I'd say she is definitely one of the better Calc professors. For one, GO TO CLASS! There is a short quiz just about every class, but it is not difficult most of the time. Business Calc is not an easy class but she makes it less difficult. I would definitely recommend taking her. Four tests, your final drops your lowest test grade.

Took her college algebra and after the 1st test i thought i was about to fail my first college course. but after actually paying attention to what she was saying and putting effort it became a breeze. daily quizzes on previous lesson, 1 or 2 questions. easy peasy. test are identical to study guides just change of numbers. Got a B. Take her

If you aren't good at math don't take her. don't ask questions in class because she will answer with a rude or condescending remark. if you don't do a problem the right way and you ask her to explain she gets mad. do the homework or you won't understand. would not recommend unless you want a teach with a bad attitude

Professor Worthy knows her thing; very organized, teaches very well and explains Math in a way that if you're paying attention you'll get it. She stays on schedule and complete subjects with many examples that will help you understand. Her short quizzes at each class are very helpful. No tricks on tests, review sheets are good guide to make an  A.
Worthy is a great math teacher.  She makes a tough subject easy.  Take advantage of the quizzes given because you can get a lot of points. Make sure you go to class and you will pass.

The layout of her class is not favorable to a student who is not the greatest at math. She has 3 tests and a final. She drops the lowest test score and replaces it with the final and that's great. However she does not use Mymathlab and instead replaces the easy points of MML with quizzes. These quizzes can be extremely difficult and at times unfair
Worthy is great! She has the BEST stories and always is open to help. She explained things in ways I've never heard and helped me understand concepts that I hadn't grasped before.
If you go to class and listen, you will do good. It was a tough class but she was an excellent teacher.

Prof. Worthy is amazing. She makes a difficult topic so easy. She is funny and has good style. I was afraid to take her class but she was amazingly helpful and a great teacher. I would take her in a heart beat. Kayla Waters was incredible with her SI Sessions.
By far one of the greatest math teachers.....She is so helpful...This was my second time taking the class and with her I aced the class I am no math major but she really helped me excel!

I will say that in all my years of taking math Mrs. Worthy is far the BEST professor ever.  Although attendance is NOT mandatory she does give quizzes every class,numerous attempts for extra credit,and is very helpful.I definitely recommend taking her. Also Kayla her S.I. is very helpful.

I took Professor Worthy for College Algebra my freshman year, and she was so awesome that I decided to take her for Calculus. EXCELLENT professor, really teaches subject, and give LOTS of extra credit. No way you can fail. I'll take her every year if I could!
She's a really good teacher and ha extra office hours to help you if you don't understand.

Mrs. Worthy is an amazing teacher who really takes the time to make sure you know the material. She has short cuts for everything, the reviews are exactly like the test. She is simple and to the point and if you need help she is more than happy to give it! Best math teacher i have taken at KSU BY FAR! Only bad part.. MML.. I can't stand it! :(

I loved her. She is by far the best math professor i have ever had. She gives a lot of extra points for attendance and if you do your work. Quizzes are easy. Just pay attention and come to class. Take her . Take her. Take her

More than fair teacher. Math is difficult and she tries to make it understandable. She gives lots of extra credits. Be there to class everyday and she'll give you an extra 10 points and review sheets are usually counted as extra credit towards a quiz grade. She drops two low quiz grades and replaces the lowest test grade with your final.
She is great. I wish i needed another math class

Overall she's a pretty good calculus teacher. 20 quizzes (but are easy cuz she usually tells u the format of the problem the class before), 3 tests, and a final. She doesnt use MyMathLab anymore and that's great. Tests look exactly like the study guide, and drops lowest test grade for final. Just watch out for test 2. Not an A, but not hard either.

Not the greatest teacher but she is more than fair!! You do a ton of homework on MyMathLab, but it really helps you prepare for tests. You have 13 quizes (3 dropped), 4-5 sections of homework, and 4-5 tests.gives you 10 extra points to your grade if you dont miss a day. The study guides are almost identical to the test.Final can replace lowest test

LOVED THIS TEACHER!! One of the best teachers at KSU. She really helps you understand the materal. Test are almost identical to the study guide and you can do the homework until you get a 100 which helps your grade. offers lots of extra credit. all around great teacher! TAKE HER!
Professor Worthy is a lot of fun in class and will try hard to help you understand the material if you ask her.  If you do the homework and the review sheets you should do fine.
Professor Worthy was awesome! She made calculus enjoyable. I recommend anyone to take her! Wish she taught the higher level classes!!

Great teacher and really nice person. She gives a lot of extra credit and opportunities to earn more points. She's extremely helpful and wants you to do well in her class. I dreaded taking calculus but ended up enjoying it and making an A thanks to her. TAKE HER!

She is a ok person but not a caring professor. If you are not good in math you may not want to take her. She is a hard grader no make-ups she will not reopen math lab at the end so do all the homework. My advice take another professor is possible.

MyMathLab has numerous mistakes that publisher does not fix after several editions. Extra credit for attendance (if you are weak in math DO NOT MISS CLASS) & MUST do HW-it is going to help your grade. Drops lowest 2 quizes & final replaces lowest exam grade. 1 of the hardest classes I have ever taken. Prof Worthy is nice but be prepared to work.

She seems to favor the guys the most. If you?re a guy you will probably do well if she likes you.   She makes a lot of mistake yet she is a hard grader.  She does not care whether you pass or fail so be careful when taking her. She not a good person for a math course.

Best math teacher I have ever had. I took her for 1106 and 1111. Attendance isnt mandatory, but its extra credit. She gives out tons of extra credit. Homework is a easy 100, its online. and tests are exactly like the study guide. I made a 95 or higher in both the classes I had with her. I absolutely loved her, take her...you would be crazy not to!
Great prof. she was very clear and helpful. The homework is harder than the tests, but the quizes were easy.

GREAT PROFESSOR! If you attend class, take notes and do the homework on time, there is no reason you should do badly in her class. Answers all questions quickly and clearly and cares about student's success (as long as the student is showing effort). The course is difficult but she makes it totally do-able!!

STOP THE PRESS! i am shocked at professor worthy ratings those kids must have not done any work and expected to get a good grade..come on. I just completed this class and trust me TAKE HER!!! She knows her stuff and knows how to relate the material to you in a way that makes sense. An A is very possible.oh..save $$ no text required

She was one of the best math teachers I have ever had. She gives huge bonus points for attendance and also gives easy quizzes that can really bring your grade up. The tests aren't too hard and the study guides are the exact same as the test. Not to mention there was hardly any homework.

Complaints about the way the book structures lecture but does nothing to change it. Makes everything hard. Her powerpoint are not helpful and her quizzes are way too often and people usually fail them

She is nice. I personally had to ask her 4 times for a homework explanation and I am still waiting for the answer. In class she prepares you for her test but not the homework, and the homework is very hard and you will spend hours searching your notes and will not find how to solve the problem.

This is one of my favorite teachers. She is really good at teaching the material. She makes it easy to follow. You do not need the book at all! The only thing is the homework gets long and is harder than whats on the test, but overall the hw is not bad. I highly recommend her. She is funny and keeps you interested
Debora Worthy did not teach MATH 1107 I think you are confused
Teacher could care less if you pass or fail. Out of 30 people in my class, half failed!
